eval_kwargs.reference_answer: The idea of this formula is decomposing token representations into their constituent vectors based on vector-based approaches. Decompose the i-th token representation in layer l into elemental vectors attributable to each of the N input tokens. So we can compute the norm of the attribution vector of the k-th input to quantify its total attribution to xi.
